name: Nightly Maintenance: Malcom's Story
description:
Blurb

What do you do when your mannequin goes missing? Apparently you call some random guy named Malcom. Malcom is called to find Mannequins LLC’s mannequin. After discovering where the mannequin is, they give him a call and tell him they'd like for him to come after hours to do maintenance tasks for them. He is short on money so he has no other choice but to accept. However, some kind of evil is lurking in this factory that will keep him from doing his job…

Controls

Move - WASD

Look - Mouse

Interact - E

(Controllers are useable however not full supported yet. Problems may arise.)
